channel.title: 3.9.x on DB Browser for SQLite
channel.description: Recent content in 3.9.x on DB Browser for SQLite

item.title: WinXP version for 3.9.1
item.description: Due to popular demand, there is now a Windows XP compatible download.

item.title: Rebuilt OSX binary for v3.9.1
item.description: The v3.9.1 binary for OSX has been rebuilt using Qt 5.7.1, to fix an important colour display problem on macOS Sierra.

item.title: PortableApp for 3.9.1
item.description: PortableApp version of DB4S 3.9.1 now available. Thanks John! 😄

item.title: New Qt5 based nightly builds online
item.description: New Qt5 based nightly builds are online.

item.title: PortableApp version of 3.9.0
item.description: Added PortableApp download for version 3.9.0. Thanks John! 😄

item.title: Version 3.9.0 released
item.description: The next major release, version 3.9.0 is ready for download!

item.title: Version 3.9.0 beta1 released
item.description: Version 3.9.0 beta1 released, with SQLCipher for strong encryption. [Please try it out](https://github.com/sqlitebrowser/sqlitebrowser/releases/tag/v3.9.0-beta1), and [report any new bugs](https://github.com/sqlitebrowser/sqlitebrowser/issues) you encounter. :smile:
